contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|VI|vi|.vi|v.i.}} '''VI''' or '''Vi''' may refer to: {{TOC Right}} ==In music== *The [[submediant]] chord in music (symbolized "VI" or "vi") *[[VI (album)|''VI'' (album)]], 1987 album by the Circle Jerks *''[[VI - Return of the Real]]'', 1996 album by Ice-T *''[[Beatles VI]]'', 1965 album by The Beatles *''[[Chicago VI]]'', 1973 album by the American rock band, Chicago *[[VI Music]], a Puerto Rican record label ==In names== *[[Vi (Buffy the Vampire Slayer)|Vi (''Buffy the Vampire Slayer'')]], a character in ''Buffy the Vampire Slayer'' *[[Violet (name)]] or Vi *Vi, the Piltover Enforcer, a playable champion character in the action real-time strategy video game ''[[League of Legends]]'' *[[Vi Hart]], a "recreational mathemusician" ==In numbering systems== *[[6 (number)]] or ''VI'', in Roman numerals *[[Abducens nerve]], 6th cranial nerve *[[Group 6 element]] in the periodic table *[[Carretera Nacional N-VI]], a major road in Spain, connecting Madrid and A Coruña ==In organizations== *[[VI Corps (Union Army)]], a corps of the Union Army during the American Civil War, active 1862–1865 *[[VI Corps (United States)]], a corps in the regular army, active 1940–1968 *[[Vi Senior Living, Classic Residence]], a provider of retirement communities in the United States *[[Victoria Institution]], a secondary school in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia *[[The Vinyl Institute]], a U.S. industry trade group *[[Voetbal International]], a prominent Dutch football (soccer) magazine *[[Volga-Dnepr]] Airline (IATA code: VI), an airline based in Ulyanovsk, Russia ==In places== *Vi is the name of many villages in Sweden, such as: **[[Vi, Sweden]] at Alnön, near Sundsvall **Norra Vi Church, in [[Ydre_Municipality#Sights|a sight in Ydre Municipality]] **[[Södra Vi]] **[[Viby (disambiguation)]] *Vi, a village in [[Shkodër County]], Albania *[[British Virgin Islands]] (FIPS country code: VI), a British territory in the Caribbean *[[United States Virgin Islands]] (USPS abbrev: VI; ISO 3166: VI; WMO: VI), a United States territory in the Caribbean **[[.vi]], the country code top level domain (ccTLD) for United States Virgin Islands *[[Vancouver Island]], British Columbia, Canada *[[Victoria Island (Nigeria)]], an area of Lagos, Nigeria ==In other uses== *[[vi]], screen-oriented text editor software *[[vide infra]], meaning "see below" *[[Vietnamese language]] (ISO 639: vi), the national and official language of Vietnam *[[Virtual Interchange]] *[[Virtual instrument (disambiguation)]], a program that implements functions of an instrument by computer, sensors and actuators *[[Vulnerability index]] ==See also== *[[V1 (disambiguation)]] (number "1" as opposed to letter "i") {{disambiguation}}
